```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(gapminder)

```




```{r}
# Loading
data(mtcars)
# Print the first 6 rows
head(mtcars, 6)
```

```{r}

ggplot(mtcars) +
  geom_point(aes(mpg, hp))

```

```{r}

p <- gapminder %>%
  filter(year==1977) %>%
  ggplot( aes(gdpPercap, lifeExp, size = pop, color=continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()

ggplotly(p) %>% as_widget()

```
